channel.title: .Shell File Problem
channel.description: I'm using the "Ssh File Transfer" to turn on my server VIA Vps. Everytime I try to type "bash run.sh" which runs the server, I get this error. " run.sh: line 2: java: command not found " If anyone could help that'd be greatly appreciated. Either reply here or message me on skype "lukersps" Thank You.

item.title: .Shell File Problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make sure java is installed and you have set up the environmental variables for your VPS.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=367407.15
Step 5 might help a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: .Shell File Problem
item.dc:creator: @runehilates runehilates
item.description:
@runehilates wrote:

I’m using the “Ssh File Transfer” to turn on my server VIA Vps.
Everytime I try to type “bash run.sh” which runs the server, I get this error.
" run.sh: line 2: java: command not found "
If anyone could help that’d be greatly appreciated.
Either reply here or message me on skype "lukersps"
Thank You.

Read full topic
